title: Alien
summary: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

title: Aliens
summary: Ripley returns to the planet where her crew encountered the hostile Alien, this time accompanied by a unit of Colonial Marines.

title: American Beauty
summary: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a midlife crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

title: American History X
summary: A former neo-Nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same path he did.

title: American Psycho
summary: A wealthy New York investment banker hides his psychopathic alter ego from his coworkers and friends.

title: Apocalypse Now
summary: During the Vietnam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission up the Nung River into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade colonel.

title: Arrested Development
summary: Michael Bluth finds himself forced to keep his wealthy, dysfunctional family together after the patriarch is imprisoned.

title: Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Avengers: Endgame
summary: After Thanos' devastating snap, the remaining Avengers assemble one final time to undo the damage and restore balance to the universe.

title: Back to the Future
summary: Marty McFly is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his eccentric scientist friend Doc Brown.

title: Batman Begins
summary: After training with his mentor, Bruce Wayne returns to Gotham City and begins his crusade against crime as Batman.

title: Better Call Saul
summary: The transformation of Jimmy McGill into the morally compromised lawyer Saul Goodman, set years before the events of Breaking Bad.

title: The Big Lebowski
summary: Laid-back Los Angeles slacker Jeff 'The Dude' Lebowski is mistaken for a millionaire of the same name and gets drawn into a bizarre kidnapping scheme.

title: Blade Runner
summary: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth seeking their creator.

title: Blade Runner 2049
summary: Young blade runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard, a former blade runner who has been missing for thirty years.

title: Breaking Bad
summary: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with terminal lung cancer turns to manufacturing methamphetamine to secure his family's future.

title: Braveheart
summary: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

title: The Breakfast Club
summary: Five high school students from different social cliques are forced to spend a Saturday in detention, where they discover they have more in common than they thought.

title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
summary: A young woman destined to slay vampires, demons, and other supernatural forces battles evil while navigating the challenges of everyday life.

title: Cast Away
summary: A FedEx executive must transform himself physically and emotionally to survive after a plane crash strands him on a deserted island.

title: Children of Men
summary: In a chaotic world where humanity has become infertile, a disillusioned bureaucrat is tasked with transporting a miraculously pregnant woman to safety.

title: The Dark Knight
summary: Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice when the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham.

title: Coco
summary: Aspiring musician Miguel enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer, and uncovers a family mystery.

title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
summary: Seinfeld co-creator Larry David plays a fictionalized version of himself, stumbling through social situations and confrontations in Los Angeles.

title: Dark
summary: A missing child sets four families on a frantic hunt for answers as they uncover a mind-bending mystery that spans three generations.

title: The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police force attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: Dexter
summary: A forensic blood spatter analyst for the Miami police department moonlights as a serial killer who targets other murderers.

title: Die Hard
summary: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza.

title: Django Unchained
summary: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

title: Downton Abbey
summary: The lives of the aristocratic Crawley family and their servants in the post-Edwardian era, chronicling great events in history and social upheaval.

title: Dune
summary: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people.

title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
summary: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home planet.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
summary: When a couple undergo a medical procedure to erase each other from their memories, Joel discovers mid-process that he wants to hold on to the fading traces of Clementine.

title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
summary: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure where she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.

title: Fargo
summary: Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's botched kidnapping scheme unravels when a pregnant police chief investigates a series of roadside homicides.

title: Fargo
summary: An anthology series inspired by the Coen Brothers film, exploring various tales of crime, deception, and murder in the American Midwest.

title: Fight Club
summary: An insomniac office worker and a reckless soap salesman form an underground fight club that evolves into an anarchist movement.

title: Finding Nemo
summary: After his son is captured and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey across the ocean to bring him home.

title: Fleabag
summary: A dry-witted, sexually voracious young woman navigates life in London while breaking the fourth wall to guide the audience through her chaotic existence.

title: Forrest Gump
summary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with a low IQ.

title: Friends
summary: Six young friends navigate the trials and tribulations of life, love, and careers while living in Manhattan.

title: Frozen
summary: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice, her sister Anna must team up with a rugged iceman to set things right.

title: Game of Thrones
summary: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

title: Get Out
summary: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, only to uncover a disturbing secret about the family's estate.

title: Gladiator
summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: The Godfather
summary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

title: The Godfather Part II
summary: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed alongside his son Michael's struggle to expand and protect the family business.

title: GoodFellas
summary: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
summary: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

title: Inception
summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

title: Pulp Fiction
summary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
summary: A banker convicted of uxoricide forms a friendship over a quarter century with a hardened convict, while maintaining his innocence and secretly engineering his escape.

title: The Matrix
summary: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Stranger Things
summary: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and a strange little girl.

title: A Clockwork Orange
summary: In a dystopian future Britain, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a controversial government rehabilitation experiment.

title: A Beautiful Mind
summary: After John Nash, a brilliant mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish as he battles schizophrenia.

title: The Big Short
summary: A group of misfit investors discover the impending collapse of the housing market and bet against the big banks in the years leading up to the 2008 financial crisis.

title: Black Mirror
summary: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

title: Black Panther
summary: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and confront a challenger from his father's past.

title: The Boys
summary: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers for personal gain and corporate profit.

title: Casablanca
summary: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles with whether to help his former lover and her husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

title: Chinatown
summary: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer in 1930s Los Angeles finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

title: City of God
summary: In the slums of Rio de Janeiro, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

title: The Crown
summary: Chronicles the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the twentieth century.

title: Deadpool
summary: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal yet horribly scarred, then hunts down the man who ruined his looks.

title: The Deer Hunter
summary: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts the lives of people in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.

title: Doctor Strange
summary: A brilliant neurosurgeon discovers the hidden world of sorcery after a devastating car accident and must use his new abilities to protect the Earth.

title: Drive
summary: A mysterious Hollywood stuntman and getaway driver lands himself in trouble when he helps out his neighbor's husband in a botched heist.

title: Dune: Part Two
summary: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen to wage war against the conspirators who destroyed his family while trying to prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

title: Elf
summary: After discovering he is a human raised by elves at the North Pole, Buddy travels to New York City to find his biological father.

title: The Exorcist
summary: When a young girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two Catholic priests to save her.

title: The Favourite
summary: In early 18th century England, a new servant arrives at Court and soon becomes a rival to the Queen's close friend for influence and affection.

title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
summary: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the principal thinks of that.

title: Full Metal Jacket
summary: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their boot camp training to the Tet Offensive.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
summary: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search of her homeland with the help of a drifter named Max.

title: Ghostbusters
summary: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City.

title: The Good Place
summary: When Eleanor Shellstrop finds herself in the afterlife, she must hide the fact that she doesn't belong there while learning to become a better person.

title: Grease
summary: Good girl Sandy and greaser Danny must navigate peer pressure and their differences to rekindle their summer romance during their senior year.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
summary: A legendary concierge at a famous European hotel between the wars and his protege become embroiled in the theft and recovery of a priceless painting.

title: Gravity
summary: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space with dwindling resources and no link to Earth.

title: The Green Mile
summary: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a gentle giant of a man convicted of child murder who possesses a mysterious gift.

title: Groundhog Day
summary: A cynical TV weatherman finds himself reliving the same day over and over again in a small Pennsylvania town, and must learn to take stock of his life.

title: Atlanta
summary: Two cousins navigate the Atlanta rap scene in an effort to improve their lives and the lives of their families.

title: The Bear
summary: A young chef from the fine dining world returns to Chicago to run his family's sandwich shop after a tragedy.

title: The Conjuring
summary: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

title: Daredevil
summary: A blind lawyer by day battles crime at night on the streets of Hell's Kitchen as the vigilante known as Daredevil.

title: The Empire Strikes Back
summary: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader.

title: The Expanse
summary: In a future where humanity has colonized the solar system, a detective and a ship's officer uncover a conspiracy that threatens the system's fragile peace.

title: The Grand Tour
summary: Three motoring enthusiasts travel across the globe on a series of wild car-based adventures.

title: Bridesmaids
summary: A woman's life unravels as she leads her best friend's bridesmaids in a series of increasingly disastrous pre-wedding events.

title: Edge of Tomorrow
summary: A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, with each death resetting the loop and bringing him one step closer to defeating the enemy.

title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
summary: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm-raiding ways, and must help his community survive three vengeful farmers.

title: Gone Girl
summary: With his wife's disappearance having become a media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it appears he may not be innocent.

title: Good Will Hunting
summary: A janitor at MIT has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

title: The Goonies
summary: A group of young misfits discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.

title: The Graduate
summary: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

title: Deadwood
summary: A show set in the late 1800s that charts the growth of Deadwood, South Dakota from a lawless camp to a functioning, Wild West town.

title: Ex Machina
summary: A young programmer is selected to participate in a groundbreaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced AI.

title: The French Connection
summary: A pair of NYC cops in the narcotics bureau stumble onto a drug smuggling ring based in Marseille and try to bring down the mastermind behind it.

title: Friday Night Lights
summary: A drama set around a Texas high school football team and how their small town revolves around them, exploring family, community, and ambition.

title: The Gilded Age
summary: A young woman from rural Pennsylvania moves in with her wealthy aunts in 1880s New York, where she becomes enmeshed in a social war between old and new money.

title: Creed
summary: The son of Apollo Creed seeks out Rocky Balboa to train him and help him pursue his dream of becoming a boxing champion.

title: Community
summary: A suspended lawyer is forced to enroll in a community college and discovers an unlikely group of friends with whom he forms a study group.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
summary: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman is forced out of exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
summary: A charming thief and his band of unlikely adventurers embark on an epic heist to recover a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry.

title: Chernobyl
summary: A dramatization of the April 1986 nuclear accident at Chernobyl and the unprecedented cleanup effort that followed.

title: The Americans
summary: Two Soviet KGB agents pose as an American married couple in the suburbs of Washington, D.C., during the Cold War.

title: Halloween
summary: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield to kill again.

title: Happy Gilmore
summary: A rejected hockey player puts his slap shot to good use on the professional golf circuit to save his grandmother's house.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
summary: An orphaned boy discovers he is a wizard on his eleventh birthday and enrolls at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: Her
summary: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an artificially intelligent operating system.

title: Hereditary
summary: After the family matriarch passes away, a grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences driven by sinister secrets.

title: Homeland
summary: A bipolar CIA operative becomes convinced a recently rescued POW has been turned by al-Qaeda and is planning a terrorist attack on American soil.

title: House
summary: An antisocial maverick doctor who specializes in diagnostic medicine does whatever it takes to solve puzzling cases that come his way.

title: House of Cards
summary: A ruthless politician will stop at nothing to conquer everything in the ruthless world of Washington, D.C.

title: How I Met Your Mother
summary: A father recounts to his children the journey he and his friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

title: The Hunger Games
summary: In a dystopian future, a young woman volunteers to take her sister's place in a televised fight to the death.

title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
summary: A defiant young city kid and his cranky foster uncle become the targets of a manhunt after getting lost in the New Zealand bush.

title: The Hurt Locker
summary: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his reckless disregard for safety.

title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
summary: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones races against Nazis to recover the lost Ark of the Covenant before they can use its power.

title: Inglourious Basterds
summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a group of Jewish-American soldiers known as 'The Basterds' plan to assassinate Nazi leaders.

title: Inside Out
summary: After a young girl moves to a new city, her emotionsJoy, Fear, Anger, Disgust, and Sadnessconflict on how best to navigate her new life.

title: Interstellar
summary: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival as Earth faces an agricultural crisis.

title: Into the Wild
summary: After graduating from Emory University, Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, donates his savings, and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness.

title: Iron Man
summary: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

title: It
summary: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster that disguises itself as a clown and preys on children.

title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
summary: Five egocentric friends who run a decrepit Irish pub in Philadelphia scheme and connive their way through life.

title: Jaws
summary: A giant great white shark terrorizes a New England resort town, prompting the local police chief, a marine biologist, and a grizzled fisherman to hunt it down.

title: Jerry Maguire
summary: A sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, then tries to build a practice with his sole remaining client.

title: Jojo Rabbit
summary: A young German boy in the Hitler Youth discovers his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their attic, with Adolf Hitler as his imaginary friend.

title: Joker
summary: In Gotham City, a failed comedian's descent into madness and nihilism inspires a violent countercultural revolution.

title: Jurassic Park
summary: A paleontologist and his colleagues visit an island theme park populated by dinosaurs created from prehistoric DNA, but the park's security systems fail.

title: Justified
summary: U.S. Marshal Raylan Givens is reassigned to his hometown in eastern Kentucky, where he must contend with an old friend turned criminal.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
summary: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of killers who betrayed her.

title: Killing Eve
summary: A bored MI5 security officer becomes entangled in a cat-and-mouse game with a psychopathic assassin.

title: The King's Speech
summary: The story of King George VI's struggle with a crippling stammer and the unorthodox speech therapist who helps him overcome it.

title: Knives Out
summary: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family, where everyone is a suspect.

title: La La Land
summary: A jazz pianist and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

title: The Last of Us
summary: In a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by a fungal infection, a hardened smuggler is tasked with escorting a teenage girl across the remnants of the United States.

title: Law & Order
summary: Police detectives investigate crimes in New York City, and prosecutors bring the offenders to justice.

title: Legally Blonde
summary: A sorority queen enrolls at Harvard Law School to win back her ex-boyfriend but discovers she has more to offer than anyone expected.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
summary: A young hobbit must journey across Middle-earth to destroy a powerful ring before the Dark Lord Sauron can reclaim it.

title: Lost
summary: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together to survive on a mysterious tropical island.

title: Luther
summary: A brilliant but emotionally impulsive detective hunts down London's most dangerous criminals while struggling with his own inner demons.

title: Mad Men
summary: A drama about the professional and personal lives of the ambitious men and women of a 1960s New York advertising agency.

title: The Mandalorian
summary: A lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy finds himself protecting an unexpected alien youngling.

title: Marvel's The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop the demigod Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: Mean Girls
summary: A homeschooled teenager raised in Africa navigates the treacherous social hierarchy of a suburban Illinois high school.

title: Memento
summary: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer using notes, photographs, and tattoos.

title: Midsommar
summary: A couple travels to rural Sweden to attend a mid-summer festival, only to find themselves in the clutches of a pagan cult.

title: Mindhunter
summary: In the FBI's early days of criminal profiling, two agents expand the field of criminal psychology by interviewing imprisoned serial killers.

title: Money Heist
summary: An enigmatic figure called 'The Professor' recruits a group of criminals to carry out the most audacious heist in history.

title: Moneyball
summary: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane uses a revolutionary sabermetric approach to assemble a competitive baseball team on a limited budget.

title: Moonlight
summary: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while growing up in a rough Miami neighborhood across three defining chapters.

title: Mr. Robot
summary: An unstable cybersecurity engineer and hacker is recruited by a mysterious anarchist to destroy the corporation he works for.

title: Mulholland Drive
summary: A woman suffering from amnesia after a car accident on Mulholland Drive and an aspiring actress unravel a dark Hollywood mystery.

title: Napoleon Dynamite
summary: A listless and alienated teenager in rural Idaho decides to help his new friend win the class presidency.

title: Narcos
summary: A chronicle of the rise and fall of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar and the DEA agents hunting him.

title: National Treasure
summary: A treasure hunter races to find a legendary treasure hidden by the Founding Fathers before a rival can steal it.

title: Nightcrawler
summary: A driven young man stumbles into the lucrative world of freelance crime journalism in Los Angeles.

title: No Country for Old Men
summary: A hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and takes a suitcase of cash, setting off a violent chain of events involving a relentless killer.

title: Nope
summary: Two siblings running a horse ranch in California discover something mysterious that leads to a terrifying and spectacularly dangerous event.

title: Nurse Jackie
summary: A drug-addicted emergency room nurse struggles to balance her addiction with the demands of her hectic professional and personal life.

title: The Office
summary: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers at the Scranton, Pennsylvania branch of the Dunder Mifflin Paper Company.

title: Oldboy
summary: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, a man is released and seeks vengeance against his mysterious captor.

title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
summary: A faded television actor and his stunt double navigate the changing film industry in 1969 Los Angeles during the Manson Family murders.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
summary: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies the patients against the authoritarian head nurse.

title: Oppenheimer
summary: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in developing the atomic bomb during the Manhattan Project.

title: Orange Is the New Black
summary: A woman is sentenced to a minimum-security women's prison for a decade-old drug crime, where she is reunited with a former lover.

title: The Other Guys
summary: Two mismatched NYPD detectives seize an opportunity to step up when the city's top cops are sidelined.

title: Our Planet
summary: A nature documentary series exploring the world's remaining wilderness areas and the animals that inhabit them.

title: Outlander
summary: A WWII-era combat nurse is transported back in time to 1743 Scotland, where she encounters a Highland warrior.

title: Oz
summary: A brutal and realistic look at life inside a fictional maximum-security prison, focusing on the experimental unit Emerald City.

title: Pacific Rim
summary: Humanity builds giant robots called Jaegers to combat monstrous creatures known as Kaiju that have risen from the Pacific Ocean.

title: Pan's Labyrinth
summary: In Franco's Spain, a girl escapes into an eerie fantasy world where she must complete three gruesome tasks to prove she is the reincarnation of a princess.

title: Parasite
summary: Greed and class discrimination threaten the symbiotic relationship between a wealthy family and the destitute clan that schemes to infiltrate their household.

title: Parks and Recreation
summary: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Peaky Blinders
summary: A gangster family epic set in 1920s Birmingham, England, centered on a gang who sew razor blades into the peaks of their caps.

title: The Pianist
summary: A Polish Jewish pianist struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto during World War II.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate Captain Jack Sparrow to rescue the governor's daughter from undead pirates.

title: Planet of the Apes
summary: An astronaut crew crash-lands on a strange planet where intelligent apes are the dominant species and humans are primitive.

title: Platoon
summary: A young recruit in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

title: Please Like Me
summary: A twenty-something navigates love, family, and his own sexuality in Melbourne.

title: The Prestige
summary: Two rival magicians in Victorian-era London engage in a dangerous battle of wits to create the ultimate illusion.

title: Pride & Prejudice
summary: A spirited young woman sparks with a proud and wealthy gentleman in Regency-era England.

title: Prisoners
summary: When his daughter and her friend go missing, a desperate father takes matters into his own hands while a detective pursues every lead.

title: Psycho
summary: A secretary on the run checks into a secluded motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

title: The Pursuit of Happyness
summary: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he begins an unpaid internship at a brokerage firm, facing homelessness along the way.

title: Hot Fuzz
summary: A top London cop is transferred to a sleepy village where a string of mysterious deaths leads him to uncover a dark conspiracy.

title: Hotel Rwanda
summary: During the Rwandan genocide, a hotel manager shelters over a thousand refugees in his luxury hotel.

title: Inside Llewyn Davis
summary: A week in the life of a young folk singer navigating the Greenwich Village music scene of 1961.

title: In Bruges
summary: Two hitmen are ordered to lie low in Bruges, Belgium after a job gone wrong, leading to a darkly comedic clash of personalities.

title: Isle of Dogs
summary: When all the dogs of a Japanese city are banished to a garbage island, a young boy sets off to find his beloved pet.

title: John Wick
summary: A retired hitman is forced back into the criminal underworld after gangsters steal his car and kill his beloved dog.

title: L.A. Confidential
summary: Three LAPD officers with vastly different methods investigate a series of murders in 1950s Los Angeles.

title: Little Miss Sunshine
summary: A dysfunctional family road trips across the country so their young daughter can compete in a beauty pageant.

title: Logan
summary: In a near future, a weary Wolverine cares for an ailing Professor X while protecting a young mutant girl from dark forces.

title: Mad Max
summary: In a dystopian Australia, a vengeful policeman sets out to avenge his partner and family against a violent motorcycle gang.

title: Miss Congeniality
summary: A tough FBI agent goes undercover at a beauty pageant to prevent a bombing.

title: Mission: Impossible
summary: An American agent is framed for the murder of his entire espionage team and must uncover the real traitor.

title: My Cousin Vinny
summary: Two New Yorkers accused of murder in Alabama call on their cousin Vinny, an inexperienced lawyer, to defend them.

title: Network
summary: A television network exploits a deranged former anchor for ratings after he threatens to commit suicide on live television.

title: The Nice Guys
summary: A private eye and a hired enforcer investigate the apparent suicide of a fading porn star in 1970s Los Angeles.

title: Office Space
summary: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss in a scheme that quickly spirals out of control.

title: Penny Dreadful
summary: Classic horror characters are woven together in this dark Victorian-era drama set in London's demimonde.

title: Person of Interest
summary: A billionaire inventor and an ex-CIA agent use a surveillance AI to prevent crimes before they happen.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
summary: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones races against Nazis to recover the legendary Ark of the Covenant before it falls into enemy hands.

title: Rain Man
summary: A selfish yuppie discovers he has an autistic savant older brother and takes him on a cross-country road trip.

title: Ratatouille
summary: A rat with a passion for cooking forms an unlikely alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

title: Reservoir Dogs
summary: After a diamond heist goes wrong, surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

title: Rocky
summary: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a once-in-a-lifetime chance to fight the world heavyweight champion.

title: Roma
summary: A year in the life of a middle-class family's maid in Mexico City in the early 1970s.

title: Rush Hour
summary: A loyal Chinese inspector and a wisecracking LAPD detective team up to rescue the Chinese consul's kidnapped daughter.

title: Saving Private Ryan
summary: Following the Normandy landings, a group of U.S. soldiers goes behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: Scarface
summary: A Cuban immigrant rises to become a powerful drug lord in Miami, only to be consumed by greed and paranoia.

title: Schindler's List
summary: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution.

title: Seinfeld
summary: Four self-absorbed friends navigate the absurdities of everyday life in New York City in this landmark sitcom about nothing.

title: Se7en
summary: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motif.

title: Shutter Island
summary: A U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a patient from a hospital for the criminally insane on a remote island.

title: Silicon Valley
summary: A socially awkward programmer and his friends struggle to navigate the cutthroat world of Silicon Valley startups.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
summary: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated cannibalistic serial killer to catch another serial killer on the loose.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
summary: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his dimension and must join with five counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat to all realities.

title: Star Wars
summary: A farm boy joins a ragtag group of rebels to rescue a princess and destroy a planet-killing space station controlled by an evil empire.

title: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back
summary: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda while his friends are pursued across the galaxy.

title: Succession
summary: The Roy family, owners of a global media and entertainment conglomerate, fight for control of the company as the aging patriarch considers stepping down.

title: Superbad
summary: Two co-dependent high school seniors set out to score alcohol for a party on one of the last nights before graduation.

title: Ted Lasso
summary: An American college football coach is hired to manage a professional English soccer team despite having no experience with the sport.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to distract him from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
summary: The Fellowship is broken, and its members must face their separate destinies as the dark lord Sauron's forces march toward Middle-earth.

title: The Shining
summary: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence drives the father into violent madness.

title: The Sopranos
summary: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano navigates the demands of his criminal empire while dealing with personal and family issues in therapy.

title: The Truman Show
summary: An insurance salesman discovers his entire life has been a reality TV show broadcast to the world.

title: The Usual Suspects
summary: A sole survivor tells the twisted events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, beginning with five criminals meeting at a police lineup.

title: The Wire
summary: Baltimore's drug scene is explored through the eyes of both law enforcement and drug dealers in this sprawling examination of a modern American city.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, who rose from penny stocks to founding a brokerage firm that engaged in massive securities fraud.

title: There Will Be Blood
summary: A ruthless silver miner turned oilman moves to oil-rich California and enters into a rivalry with a local preacher.

title: Titanic
summary: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a penniless artist aboard the ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
summary: After more than thirty years as a top naval aviator, Pete Mitchell is called back to train a group of graduates for a dangerous mission.

title: Toy Story
summary: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

title: Toy Story 3
summary: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a daycare center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college.

title: True Detective
summary: An anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: Uncut Gems
summary: A charismatic New York City jeweler makes a series of high-stakes bets that could win him a fortune or cost him everything.

title: Unforgiven
summary: A retired Old West gunslinger reluctantly takes on one last job to collect a bounty offered by a group of women.

title: Up
summary: A seventy-eight-year-old balloon salesman ties thousands of balloons to his house and flies to South America, inadvertently bringing along a young stowaway.

title: Veep
summary: A comedic look at the day-to-day life of the Vice President of the United States, featuring the political maneuvering and mishaps of her office.

title: WALL-E
summary: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot on a deserted Earth inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will decide the fate of mankind.

title: Westworld
summary: A dark odyssey about the dawn of artificial consciousness and the evolution of sin in a futuristic theme park populated by androids.

title: Whiplash
summary: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

title: Zodiac
summary: A San Francisco cartoonist becomes obsessed with tracking down the identity of the Zodiac Killer, an unsolved case that also consumed the lives of police inspectors and reporters.

title: The Social Network
summary: The founding of Facebook is explored through the legal battles of its creator Mark Zuckerberg against former friends who claimed he stole their idea.

title: The Queen's Gambit
summary: An orphaned chess prodigy struggles with addiction on her quest to become the greatest chess player in the world.

title: Squid Game
summary: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games for a life-changing prize, but the stakes are deadly.

title: Severance
summary: Employees at a mysterious biotech company undergo a surgical procedure that separates their work memories from their personal memories.

title: Taxi Driver
summary: A mentally unstable Vietnam War veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City and becomes increasingly obsessed with cleaning up the city's moral decay.

title: The Terminator
summary: A cyborg assassin is sent back in time from 2029 to 1984 to kill a woman whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against machines.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
summary: A reprogrammed cyborg is sent back in time to protect the future leader of the human resistance from a more advanced and deadly shape-shifting terminator.

title: The Thing
summary: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

title: Twister
summary: Storm chasers attempt to deploy a tornado research device during a severe outbreak of tornadoes in Oklahoma.

title: The Sixth Sense
summary: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

title: The Princess Bride
summary: A grandfather reads his sick grandson a story about a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles as he tries to reunite with his true love.

title: Trainspotting
summary: A young Edinburgh man struggles to find something worthwhile to do with his life amid heroin addiction, unemployment, and dead-end relationships.

title: The Revenant
summary: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by his own hunting team.

title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
summary: A slacker musician must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes in order to date her.

title: The Handmaid's Tale
summary: Set in a dystopian future where a totalitarian society forces fertile women into child-bearing servitude.

title: Schitt's Creek
summary: A wealthy family suddenly finds themselves broke and must rebuild their lives in a small town they once bought as a joke.

title: The West Wing
summary: An idealistic group of staffers navigate the inner workings of the White House under a fictional Democratic president.

title: The Walking Dead
summary: A group of survivors navigate a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies while struggling to maintain their humanity.

title: The X-Files
summary: Two FBI agents investigate unexplained, paranormal cases known as X-Files, uncovering a vast government conspiracy.

title: Twin Peaks
summary: An FBI agent investigates the murder of a young woman in the small town of Twin Peaks, uncovering a web of crime and supernatural mystery.

title: South Park
summary: Four foul-mouthed boys in a small Colorado town navigate outrageous adventures that satirize current events and pop culture.

title: The Simpsons
summary: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

title: The Twilight Zone
summary: An anthology series exploring the bizarre and unexpected through standalone tales of science fiction, fantasy, and the supernatural.

title: Spirited Away
summary: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen ten-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits where humans are changed into beasts.

title: The Witch
summary: A devout Puritan family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession.

title: Sicario
summary: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the U.S.-Mexico border.

title: This Is Us
summary: A heartwarming drama following the lives of the Pearson family across multiple decades, from the parents' early relationship to their triplets' adult lives.

title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
summary: A poor boy wins a golden ticket to tour the mysterious chocolate factory of eccentric candymaker Willy Wonka.

title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
summary: The X-Men send Wolverine back in time to change a major historical event that could globally impact man and mutant alike.

title: The Batman
summary: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his own family while pursuing the Riddler.

title: Yellowstone
summary: A ranching family in Montana faces constant conflict from those who seek control of their land.

title: You
summary: A dangerously charming bookstore manager uses his obsessive nature to insert himself into the lives of those he is drawn to.

title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
summary: A young underachiever is sent to Italy to retrieve a wealthy man's spoiled son, but instead assumes his identity.

title: The White Lotus
summary: A satirical anthology series following wealthy guests and employees at a luxury resort chain as their vacations unravel.

title: Raging Bull
summary: The life of middleweight boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violent temper and inner demons destroy his relationships and career.

title: Rear Window
summary: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his Greenwich Village apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

title: The Incredibles
summary: A family of undercover superheroes is forced out of retirement to save the world while navigating the challenges of suburban life.

title: Shaun of the Dead
summary: A man's uneventful life is disrupted by a sudden zombie apocalypse, forcing him to become the unlikely hero his friends need.

title: Talk to Me
summary: A group of friends discover they can contact spirits through an embalmed hand, but their thrill-seeking ritual unleashes terrifying supernatural forces.

title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
summary: A girl with mysterious powers is pursued by various forces after escaping from a secret government facility.

title: Yellowjackets
summary: A high school girls' soccer team survives a plane crash in the wilderness, and twenty-five years later the survivors reckon with what they did to stay alive.
